name: RE1 - Classic Fan Game
description:
Fan made project of the classic 3rd person shooter Resident Evil 1. For learning purposes and still in very very early development. Trying to keep it as close to the classic verison as much as possible as far as the controls/inventory.  This game will not have any ripped stuff from any of the former or current RE games. Everything is remade from love,  based on the idea,  from the Capcom Resident Evil 1. Give it a shot and leave some feedback!

Note: No downloads needed at this time. Play in the browser and for best results use Firefox or Edge. =} or I recommend to download the     Itch.io app and play it from there.

Controls:  

WASD keys for movement/Inventory navagation. 

I Key for Inventory.  

Enter key for Interact.

W + RightShift for run.

Hold E for Aim + Enter to Shoot.
